title: Crusty Birdland Crackers
description: These seed-based crackers are very low in processed carbs.
directions: mix chia and flax seeds in bowl.
Pour boiling water on seed mix and let soak, stirring until all moisture is gone.
add rye, other flours, and brewer's yeast and mix.
Chill for half hour or so.
preheat oven to 350. Divide dough into three balls.
Place parchment paper on cookie sheet or pizza pan
Roll dough between parchment paper and wax paper. Roll as thin as possible--1/4 inch or less.
Brush with olive oil and scatter herbs and salt on surface.
Repeat with other two balls of dough.
Bake at 350 for 15 minutes (or until crisp).
Flip crackers, brush with oil and salt and herbs, and bake another 10 minutes (unless it is already crispy).
Break crackers into diamond shapes from the scoring.
